name: kaiju

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Kaiju is a program for the taxonomic classification of high-throughput
sequencing reads.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: perl-io-compress
dependencies.description: A perl library for uncompressing gzip, zip, bzip2 or lzop file/buffer.

dependencies.name: py-htseq
dependencies.description:
HTSeq is a Python package that provides infrastructure to process data
from high-throughput sequencing assays.
